title: High Business Entry Score
description: In 2024, Greece achieved a remarkable business entry score of 96.58, indicating a conducive environment for starting new businesses.

title: Advanced Digital Public Services for Business
description: Greece scored 94.50 in 2024 for digital public services and transparency in business entry, showcasing its commitment to digital transformation.

title: Operational Efficiency Challenges in Business Location
description: In 2024, Greece faced challenges with an operational efficiency score of 49.00, indicating room for improvement in establishing business locations.

title: Quality Public Services for International Trade
description: Greece's public services for facilitating international trade scored 96.11 in 2024, reflecting high-quality support for trade activities.

title: Decline in Agriculture, Forestry, and Fishing
description: In 2023, Greece experienced a significant decline in the agriculture sector with a growth rate of -26.83%, indicating challenges in this area.

title: Low Primary School Dropout Rate
description: As of 2022, only 13 primary school-aged children were out of school, representing a mere 0.0022% of the age group, highlighting strong educational retention.

title: High Tertiary Education Enrollment
description: In 2022, Greece's gross tertiary enrollment rate was 166.67%, indicating a robust higher education system with high participation rates.

title: Strong Female Participation in Higher Education
description: Female enrollment in tertiary education reached 171.99% in 2022, showcasing gender inclusivity in higher education.

title: High Male Participation in Higher Education
description: In 2022, male enrollment in tertiary education was 161.73%, reflecting strong participation in higher education among males.

title: Robust Specialist Surgical Workforce
description: As of 2015, Greece had 163.54 specialist surgeons per 100,000 population, indicating a well-staffed surgical workforce.
